name: Larry's Labyrinth
description:
How To Play

Navigate through menu screens using your mouse and walk around the map with WASD. You can pause the game using the settings gear button.

Be careful when walking through the map... Enemies are lurking in the tall grass!

Once attacked, use your spells, attacks and fleeing option to fight off the enemy. You will level up overtime and increase your fighting abilities!

Debugging options:

In the pause menu you will see the option to turn/off Debug Mode. In the game world, this will allow you to trigger an encounter. In a battle, you can automatically win, lose or flee the game.
